abilities.name: Spy Network
abilities.rule: Each time your opponent gains a CP as the result of an ability, roll one D6: on a 2+, you also gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Malefic Wardings
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 6+ invulnerable save, and a 4+ invulnerable save against Psychic Attacks and attacks made by **DAEMON** models.

abilities.name: Authority of the Inquisition
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, it can embark within any **TRANSPORT** that its Bodyguard unit can embark within.

abilities.name: Glovodan Psyber‐eagle
abilities.rule:
In your Command phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of the bearer. Until the start of your next Command phase, that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

***Designer’s Note**: Place a Glovodan Psyber‐eagle token next to the selected unit to remind you.*
